channel.title: Workshops on Large Format Photography
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on Large Format Photography

item.description:
Large Format photography: classes and workshops

Large Format photography: classes and workshops

Part of the Large Format Page.

  • Detailed reviews of some great workshops:
    • Bruce Barnbaum workshop
    • Chuck Farmer LF Zion workshop
    • Tillman Crane Ultra Large/Panoramic Camera Workshop 7⁄99
    • Michael A. Smith and Paula Chamlee Workshop 8⁄99
    • Michael A. Smith and Paula Chamlee Workshop 5⁄00
    • Anasazi backpack workshop with Don Kirby and Joan Gentry 6⁄01
  • More workshop comments and announcements: this is a spot for soliciting comments on experiences with specific workshops, as well as for workshop organizers to place announcements. Unlike the workshop reviews this does not have to be long or detailed. This is just a place to post any comments that others would find helpful.

luong@ai.sri.com
